p: As we consider the development of a cure, a thorough understanding of what ‘cure’ means is important, in particular to dispel some of the myths. There is a danger to assume that the research community understands what is required; there is a need for better communication within and across communities (research, clinical, industry, civil society) as well as for increasing HBV cure advocacy. A concerted effort to work together and facilitate cross-talk and exchange of knowledge and ideas will be vital.
